titles.title: Schoolyard Safety Act of 1998
To amend the Incentive Grants for Local Delinquency Prevention Programs Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1999 through 2004, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Schoolyard Safety Act of 1998 - Amends the Incentive Grants for Local Delinquency Prevention Program Act to authorize the use of prevention program grants for court supervised initiatives that address the illegal possession of firearms by juveniles. Requires that priority be given to grant applicants that have in effect a policy or practice that requires State and local law enforcement agencies to detain for at least 24 hours any juvenile who unlawfully possesses a firearm in a school, upon a judicial finding that the juvenile may be a danger to himself or herself or to the community. Authorizes appropriations.
